bibl.title: The Discovering and Marketing of Coptic Manuscripts. The Nag Hammadi Codices and the Bodmer Papyri.
bibl.note: Fouilles papyrologiques clandestines et marché des papyrus. - Signale que: "In a letter of 13.X.80 Turner has requested that I publish his retraction on the basis of my identification of the provenience of the Bodmer papyri with Abu Mana."
bibl.seg: Robinson James M., The Discovering and Marketing of Coptic Manuscripts. The Nag Hammadi Codices and the Bodmer Papyri.

Fouilles papyrologiques clandestines et marché des papyrus. - Signale que: "In a letter of 13.X.80 Turner has requested that I publish his retraction on the basis of my identification of the provenience of the Bodmer papyri with Abu Mana."
